bibl.title: The Unity of Plutarch's Work. "Moralia" Themes in the "Lives", Features of the "Lives" in the "Moralia"
bibl.note: Non vidimus. Cf. Gnomon 81 (2009), Bibl. Beilage 1, p. 14.
DURÁN MAÑAS Monica, La dinastía de los Ptolemos en Plutarco: etopeya de los personajes.
Anastasios G. NIKOLAIDIS (Ed.), The Unity of Plutarch's Work. "Moralia" Themes in the "Lives", Features of the "Lives" in the "Moralia" = Millennium Studies. 19 (Berlin - New York, 2008) pp. 625-636.
